page.title: 09Home Life 3 - Yardley
page.content: The person who seems to do the most work in the home is the adult female. She does jobs like housework,washing, washing-up and ironing in a lot of cases,and sometimes she does the gardening and house maintenance as well,although more usually the adult male does these.Only rarely does he do the housework or washing-up and few men that we asked did the washing or the ironing, but none of them were single. Children seem to have a fairly easy time.They do not do much to help.Only one boy did anything at all and he helped to do the washing- up.More girls helped,one doing the housework,one doing the washing-up,another doing the ironing and two helped by washing the family car.
